definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">subtriggerShape</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Count</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminoffhand"/></value></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminoffhand"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">replaceitem entity @p slot.weapon.offhand world_trigger_craft:raygusttrigger 1 0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="entity_nbt_num_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">trion</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">trion</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
